Private Wheelchair Assessments

Your Occupational Therapist (OT) will provide you with a professional, impartial wheelchair assessment, complete with detailed report, including your wheelchair and cushion prescription,

This will ensuring any wheelchair you purchase will meet your long-term needs.

Learn More

Residential and Nursing Homes

Our Occupational Therapists (OT's) can offer independent wheelchair assessments for your clients who are either not eligible for NHS provision or who seek a private assessment.

We offer advice and guidance to residential and nursing homes that are purchasing mobility equipemtn in addition to tailored training and support.

Learn More

Wheelchair Rental Options

We offer wheelchairs, including tilt-in-space wheelchairs, for short and long term hire, with professional set up and handover.

Personal Weighing Service

We offer a weighing service in the privacy and comfort of your own home for clients who are wheelchair users.

Learn More

Why Choose Us?

Advice you can trust

With over 24 years' experience in the clinical assessment and treatment of adults and children, our team can support you to achieve your mobility needs.

Avoid long wait times

We provide a responsive service helping you to avoid lengthy waiting times and find a mobility solution as quickly as possible.

Affordable access

We provide a wide range of competitively priced and high-quality options from specialist suppliers. We offer a hire service for those who need a temporary solution.
